tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: A++ Service!!!  I found Dr. Soundaram on this forum.  We live in California, USA and visit Chennai regularly for our charity work there.  We stay at Green Park Hotel.  After searching for a dentist, it appeared that Dr. Soundaram's office was a viable option.  Her positive reviews, plus the close proximity to our hotel made for a good fit . Also, after calling several other dentists in the area, she was the first to respond; so we made appointments.  Perhaps, because she has a home based clinic in a residential part of town, the auto-rickshaw driver had a bit of a problem finding her.   It turns out, her office is within walking distance to Green Park Hotel.   Dr. Soundaram's warmth and professionalism are gifts.  She clearly explains what needs to be done, the options available and the best outcomes. She was honest enough to say,  I didn't need anything done.  However, my husband needed two root canals.  In one day, Dr. Soundaram performed the entire work.  In two days the crowns came in and she put them in place.  My husband had NO PAIN at all!!!   In the USA, this procedure would have cost hundreds, perhaps thousands of dollars US.  Dr. Soundaram didn't gouge us.  She charged Indian ruppee cost.  There was no wait time at all.  I can't say enough about her expertise and and friendliness.  Any time we need work done, we will make appointments with her!   My only wish is that her beautiful window box where I sat for hours while she worked on my husband, had a cushion on the gorgeous, but very  hard granite!  LOL

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: *** ** *** **** ******* * **** **** ***** **** ** *** ***** **** She was very patient in explaining the issues of my teeth and all possible procudures for it, she was equally polite as well. I had to remove two of my wisdom teeth and she did both the procedures as cool as a cucumber. She was available online as well to assist me pre and post my surgery. She made the whole process very comfortable and relieving. Kids would want to be around such a dentist. I am grateful for her, a true professional!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I had an excellent experience here, I decided to go to this place after reading the reviews, the doctor was very friendly she was kind enough to listen to all my problems and explained to me what was the problem, suggested the treatment and was very professional. I went to the doctor for my wisdom tooth extraction and was very scared doctor made me feel very comfortable and it was painless. She was also following up every day after the treatment to check on my condition, she also made sure that all safety precautions were taken care of during this pandemic season, and it is very affordable also. I highly recommend this place to anyone who is looking for a dentist appointment üëçüëç

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Doctor is very Kind. Doctor was very friendly she was kind enough to listen to all my problems and explained to me what was the problem.I'm totally satisfied with the treatment.

I will definitely recommend my friends and family members.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
************ ** *** ** *** **** *******. She has a great sense of positivity and a very cool approach.
I'm seeing her for past 10yrs and even if I panic, she calms me down in best possible way. I would suggest her for any person, be it a kid or old aged to visit her for any dental treatment

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr. Soundaram is amazing. 
She is super friendly and is such an experienced doctor. 
I am a person who has been very sceptical of dentists in the past, having had a bad experience previously, but Dr. Soundaram completely shattered my fears and hesitations. 
Gave me the best results along with such a wonderful experience. 
10/10.

tags: None
review:
I have been Dr.Soundaram's patient for sometime now. She is very caring and a thorough professional. A qualified dentist coupled with caring nature.
What I like most is that she follows up with her patients even after the treatment is over to find out how they are. A caring human gesture which is so rare these days!! 
Wish her all the best in her profession!!

tags: Wait time,Value for money,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Toothache Remedies,Tooth Sensitivity,Dental X-Ray,Dental Fillings,Tooth Extraction,
review: Dr. Soundaram was known to my family from her early days of her practice in Bangalore itself and even now we take her advice on any dentistry consultancy. She gives patience hearing and have always guided us correctly. Her specialist is the understanding of history and painless treatment. I recommended her, anyone who wishes to get a right ethical treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr. Soundaram is one of the excellent's in her profession. She took the time to explain every procedure she was doing. She was very supportive and thorough when explaining the process. She is natural caring personality. I would recommend Dr. Soundaram to everyone who wanted to have a better dentist experience.

review: *** ** *** **** ******** ** ***** I have come across very few doctors who are quite honest and authentic. I am glad that I went to Dr.Soundaram for my treatment.
